content.description:
Rufe, mihi redditae sunt litterae tuae quibus orabas
ut tibi aliquid ex scriptisscriptum, -i, n.: writing meis mitterem.
content.question: In the sentence, the clause ut...mitterem specifies

choices.label: when Rufus had sent the letters
where Rufus had sent the letters
the result of Rufus’s sending of the letters
what Rufus was asking the recipient to do

content.answer: what Rufus was asking the recipient to do

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
